CustomField.description: If the person being called is on a mobile phone that is roaming, this will be the short counrty code that the user is currently in.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the person being called is on a Natterbox mobile phone that is roaming, this will be the short country code that the user is currently in. If the call recipient is not on a Natterbox mobile, this field will be left blank.
CustomField.label: CalledRoaming
